bioAsHtml: Ralph is a Senior Technical Staff Member for IBM Cloud Foundation Services. The goal is to deliver high quality services to underpin the cloud and also enable customers to deploy into the cloud quickly and easily providing operational excellence for those services. Working closely with Docker and Open Stack to have Containers support for IBM Bluemix.

acceptedTalks.title: The Power of Open Source, Open Containers, and an Open Cloud

bio: Ralph is a Senior Technical Staff Member for IBM Cloud Foundation Services. The goal is to deliver high quality services to underpin the cloud and also enable customers to deploy into the cloud quickly and easily providing operational excellence for those services. Working closely with Docker and Open Stack to have Containers support for IBM Bluemix.
